actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Bruneau River, Idaho, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a specified segment of the Bruneau River, Idaho, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers system. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to supervise the acquisition and development of the river segment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Bruneau River, Idaho, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers, and for other purposes.
